title: [Placements] looking for a placement stat divided by cgpa
content:
I remember seeing a picture of 2025 or 2024 placement stats which were segregated by cgpa. I think it was from a jawahar presentation or something. 

Like avg, median and everything for different cgpas. 8.5+, 8+ and stuff like that 

Need it for a friend, please share if you have it
